articles.title: 'Five-star' Lionel Messi nets five in friendly against Estonia
articles.description: Argentina striker Lionel Messi scored five goals in a 5-0 friendly win over Estonia on Sunday, a result which helped him overtake Hungary's great Ferenc Puskas among the all-time international top scorers.
